org.ingatan.data
Class Library

java.lang.Object
  org.ingatan.data.Library

public class Library
extends java.lang.Object

Encapsulates a library of questions.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Thomas Everingham

Field Detail

name

protected java.lang.String name
The name of the library. Must not be null or an empty string.

id

protected java.lang.String id
Libraries may have the same name, so a unique id was generated for this library when it was created.

description

protected java.lang.String description
The library description, can be an empty string.

creationDate

protected java.util.Date creationDate
The date of creation of this library.

questions

protected IQuestion[] questions
The questions contained by this library.

pathTempLib

protected java.io.File pathTempLib
The path of the expanded library file. Library files are zip files, and when opened, they are extracted to a temporary location.

fileLibraryFile

protected java.io.File fileLibraryFile
The library's text file; contains all question data, etc.

images

protected java.util.Hashtable images
A hashtable of image identifiers and the corresponding File object. The Parser class has methods to generate this hash table.

Constructor Detail

Library

public Library(java.lang.String libName,
               java.lang.String id,
               java.lang.String libDescription,
               java.util.Date dateOfCreation,
               IQuestion[] questions,
               java.io.File pathTempLib,
               java.io.File fileQuestionData,
               java.util.Hashtable images)
Create a new library object.

Parameters:
libName - the name of this library (doesn't need to be unique)
id - the ID of this library (necessarily unique)
libDescription - a description of this library, what it contains (can be empty)
dateOfCreation - the date this library was created
questions - the question objects that belong to this library.
pathTempLib - the path of the temporary directory into which this library has been extracted.
fileQuestionData - the file in the temporary directory that contains all question data for this library.
images - hashtable of imageIDs and their corresponding File objects that point to files in the temporary directory.
